img_text: BURGER MALAYSIA'S FOCHEEZY JUICY HOOD BURGER If you don't believe phat meat is greezy, wait till you bite this. Served with lettuce, tomato, onions, cheddar & pepper-jack cheese, smoked applewood bacon & your choice of mayo, ranch or thousand island dressing Turn your Malaysia into the Hangover Helper.
